channel.title: Installing Postman :: C# Web Development
channel.description: When exploring and testing a web API, it is invaluable to have an interactive environment that allows you to fine-tune requests. For example, you may need to configure the HTTP method, headers, or body of the request â€“ all of which the browser does not allow you to do. Instead of testing in a browser, we can use tools made specifically for interacting with APIs. One of the most popular API tools in the industry is Postman.
